files.patch:
@@ -3333,1 +3333,2 @@
-        if (type.hasTag(VOID))
+        Assert.check(!type.hasTag(VOID));
+        if (type.hasTag(NONE))
@@ -3851,0 +3852,3 @@
+            // represent void results as NO_TYPE, to avoid unnecessary boxing in boxIfNeeded
+            if (currentRestype.hasTag(VOID))
+                currentRestype = Type.noType;
